title: Who's gonna win Worlds 2016?
body: Drop it below. Let's see your picks. So No bandwagon last second fanboys can say they've rooted for (team) all along. I think ROX Tigers will win this year and have Smeb as MVP.

replies.body:
From a neutral point of view, probably EDG or ROX.

From a very biaised point of view, C9 will stomp every single team and win worlds without a single defeat {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ C9, take my energy ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ C9, take my energy ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ C9, take my energy ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

RoX have the momentum. Though, SKT has a history of beating ROX more often so it's close

I hope it's not SKT. I dislike seeing the same team consistently winning.
yeah I dont want it to be SKT again either.
I hope SKT1 wins, I just love Faker
I'm going to vote RoX, although I support C9, I don't think they can win coming through as 3rd pick.
I think either Edward Gaming or ROX Tigers will win but I was CLG or TSM to make it to finals

Part of me wants TSM or C9 to win to watch an EU emotional breakdown across every platform.

But I wouldn't mind it if a Chinese team (like EDG ;)) won.

ROX->EDG->SKT->SSG/TSM/RNG would probably be the best bets in that order.
I hope an EU or NA LCS team wins, but I wouldnt mind seeing the SKT repeat either :p
EDG, they already should have last year - i don´t think they´ll tilt again.
I mean Signs point to Korea's 4th win but I believe that 6th time is the charm and TSM will keep the cup here.
TSM if Doublelift brings out the VAYYNEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Personally, I think ROX is gonna win it all
But I am also a huge fan of SKT (I want them to have a 3rd championship)
And then I'm from NA so my regional pride is a thing (Fave team is C9 but i'm a big fan of Aphromoo)

so mostly, I'm just here to watch my favorite teams compete with my other favorite teams :)

I'm hoping TSM! If I'm being realistic though... you know what, I'm still going to say TSM. I'm not about that bad juju; speak the positivity into the universe. In the words of a wise Hokage: BELIEVE IT!
I would hope it would be TSM too. But the Tigers just look so good
